summary: Muezzin Musa falls for his neighbor, the Catholic nurse Clara. The story gets even more exceptional when Musa meets Yakup, who turns out to be connected with Clara.
cast: Nadir Saribacak|Görkem Yeltan|Murat Ergun|Selim Makaroglu|Serpil Ozcan|Ersan Uysal|Adem Yavuz Özata
title: Uzak Ihtimal
